name: Smallies - Web Surfing Guy
description:
This is the first entry of the "Smallies" series, which consist of loop animations of bunch of these small people doing everyday activities. activities ranged from mundane everyday activities all the way to fun and exciting one.


     During the introduction phase of the series, there will be more of these guys doing more of their daily activities. But as the project move forward, in the next phase there's going to be be narrative involved. In this phase it wont be just random animations, but its going to have narrative to it, and when all of the videos are played together in series, it will form a short movie.
